title: Audio Engineer Intern Freelance
description:
**Overview**  
We are seeking a skilled Audio Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for audio production and possess expertise in signal processing, film, video production, and post-production techniques.

**Duties**  
- Collaborate with the video production team to create high-quality audio for various projects  
- Utilize DAW's such as Logic Pro X, Avid Pro Tools, Ableton Live, FL Studio, and other tools for audio editing.  
- Manage sound recording equipment and ensure optimal sound quality during recording sessions  
- Conduct post-production tasks including mixing, editing, and mastering audio tracks  
- This will be a 8-12 week internship (freelance) with the possibility of becoming a full time engineer for our studio.

**Experience**  
- Proven experience in audio engineering and production  
- Proficiency in using industry-standard software.  
- Strong knowledge of signal processing techniques and post-production workflows  
- Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment  
- A keen eye for detail and a creative approach to trouble shooting and solving audio challenges.

Job Types: Full-time, Internship, Freelance

Pay: $1.00 - $2.00 per hour

Expected hours: 8 – 32 per week

Ability to Commute:

* Washington, DC 20007 (Required)

Work Location: In person
